amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered En Bloc No. 2: amendments Nos. 108, 109, 110, 112, 115, 117, 121, 124, 125, and 126 printed in House Report 114-683.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 108, 109, 110, 112, 115, 117, 121, 124, 125, and 126 printed in House Report 114-683. See page D807 of the Congressional Record of July 13, 2016 for description of en bloc amendments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Calvert amendments (A079) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A079) offered by Mr. Calvert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Calvert amendments (A079) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A079) offered by Mr. Calvert.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
